title: oggnalive
author: oggnalive
content: It is still a week since the launch of the OGG coin, we sold the first batch on the first day of sales for $0.01. We are asking the community what the value of the second lot will be, participate, participate and vote and enjoy.We are listing the following exchanges: Xeggex - Bitmex - bitmart - p2btrade - txbit - XT..."Economy creation by digital communities free and without distinction"Vote or buy before finalizing the listing process:$0.05$0.10$0.50$1https://discord.gg/jDNJW2fDxChttps://www.oggnalive.com/https://explorer.oggnalive.com/https://twitter.com/oggnalive

comments.author: raidarksword
comments.body: From what I see on site, I don't see anything promising about it. What's OGG will become or what's the mission out of it and of course having such kind of price jump is impossible of what can OGG can offer to the community. Better to have a better plans and design of the website because marketing strategy is vital in crypto industry.

comments.author: o48o
comments.created_time: August 02, 2023, 01:52:51 PMLast edit: August 03, 2023, 12:24:35 PM by o48o
comments.body: Quote from: oggnalive on August 02, 2023, 03:10:10 AM-cut-https://www.oggnalive.com/-cut-Ok, what's the point of this? Am i supposed to find some information from here what this project is about? I know it's a coin but what's the goal? How is a website or "social media" linked to this coin. How is it powering it? The site has few vague posts in english and interface is something else, maybe spanish?If you have a whitepaper i would like to read it. What i gathered from this this far is that you are somehow building a new social media, that might or might not be linked to the coin.Edit: also claiming that you are going to list on bitmex is a lie. They have NDA on that. So even if that would be true, just by saying that you are violating their NDA and not permitted to list.

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: oggnalive on August 02, 2023, 03:10:10 AMIt is still a week since the launch of the OGG coin, we sold the first batch on the first day of sales for $0.01.
